items.content_html: TaskHub is a lightweight and intuitive task management app designed to help you organize, prioritize, and complete your tasks efficiently. Whether you're managing personal to-dos, work projects, or team collaborations, TaskHub offers a seamless experience with powerful features that keep you on track.
items.title: mohamedkhaledmk/TaskHub-Task-Management-Website: TaskHub is a lightweight and intuitive task management app designed to help you organize, prioritize, and complete your tasks efficiently. Whether you're managing personal to-dos, work projects, or team collaborations, TaskHub offers a seamless experience with powerful features that keep you on track.

items.content_html: Insomnie is a lightweight CLI and TUI HTTP client for developers. Inspired by Postman, Insomnia, Bruno and Cartero, but with a minimalist text-based interface. Test and debug APIs quickly with an intuitive and customizable tool.
items.title: marco-gallegos/insomnie: Insomnie is a lightweight CLI and TUI HTTP client for developers. Inspired by Postman, Insomnia, Bruno and Cartero, but with a minimalist text-based interface. Test and debug APIs quickly with an intuitive and customizable tool.

items.content_html: Modelita is a domain-specific language (DSL) for creating 3D shapes through code. It provides a flexible approach to describing geometry, enabling users to generate 3D data with ease while keeping the system lightweight and simple.

items.content_html: PERN Todo Tracker is a lightweight task management app built to practice and enhance my skills in working with PostgreSQL, while integrating it with a full-stack PERN (PostgreSQL, Express, React, Node.js) environment. This project showcases how relational databases can be efficiently used for CRUD operations in real-world applications.
items.title: Shariif-Mohsoo/PERN-Todo-Tracker-Practicing-PostgreSQL-with-a-Simple-Task-Manager: PERN Todo Tracker is a lightweight task management app built to practice and enhance my skills in working with PostgreSQL, while integrating it with a full-stack PERN (PostgreSQL, Express, React, Node.js) environment. This project showcases how relational databases can be efficiently used for CRUD operations in real-world applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient Inventory Management System that enables users to manage stock levels, track sales, and generate reports. Features include CRUD operations for inventory items, customer management, and export functionality. Built with modern web technologies to provide seamless and user-friendly interactions.
items.title: suhailabdaz/Stock-Ease: A lightweight and efficient Inventory Management System that enables users to manage stock levels, track sales, and generate reports. Features include CRUD operations for inventory items, customer management, and export functionality. Built with modern web technologies to provide seamless and user-friendly interactions.

items.title: emberjs/data: A lightweight reactive data library for web applications. Designed over composable primitives.

items.content_html: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
items.title: pradeepbgs/diesel: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.

items.content_html: Alternative to Netlify/Decap CMS. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support, open source & free. Made with Svelte.
